title: Pork Dumplings
ingredients: ['100 wonton wrappers', '800g minced pork', '1 tablespoon minced fresh root ginger', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons thinly sliced spring onion', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '3 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 egg, beaten', '375g finely shredded Chinese cabbage']
